author: Special Correspondent
text:
Mahakumbabhishekam of Sri Manenthiyappar Sri Vadivambikai Ambal Temple on the banks of the Tamirabharani at Kallidaikurichi was performed after 54 years on Wednesday. As the last kumbabhishekam was performed on July 13, 1962, renovation of the temple was taken up in a big way to spruce up the famous temple.

Following special pujas that commenced on January 17, kumbabhishekam was performed on Wednesday in the presence of Swami Sathyagnana Mahadeva Paramacharya and Swami Ambalavana Thambiran. Thousands of devotees from various parts of the district witnessed the maha kumbabhishekam, thirukalyanam and veethi ula in the evening.

The last kumbabhishekam was performed on July 13, 1962
title: Temple consecration performed after 54 years
